people.Name: Tim Heidecker
people.Title: Co-Founder
people.Bio: Tim is a weight lifter, poet, artist, musician and writer. He was born in Allentown, PA, in 1976. His birthstone is Amethyst (rhombohedral class 32). Tim's blood counts are high but are being maintained by a Dambeck Machine.

people.Name: Eric Wareheim
people.Title: Co-Founder
people.Bio: Eric started his career as an artisnal metal worker and glassblower throughout his 20s. After meeting Tim at a glass blowing tradeshow he helped develop the ZONE THEORY and offically changed his name to Sharm.
